body_html:
Thanks for your message. I am sorry I was not clearer, but I thought all the info you are asking was in my posting:

OS platform and distribution:

Darwin fcamacbook.dyndns.cern.ch 17.4.0 Darwin Kernel Version 17.4.0: Sun Dec 17 09:19:54 PST 2017; root:xnu-4570.41.2~1/RELEASE_X86_64 x86_64

aka

macOS High Sierra version 10.13.3 (17D47)

TensorFlow installed from & Version

master from github

bazel version

Build label: 0.10.0-homebrew
Build target: bazel-out/darwin-opt/bin/src/main/java/com/google/devtools/build/lib/bazel/BazelServer_deploy.jar
Build time: Wed Jan 10 02:02:06 +50057 (1517480013726)
Build timestamp: 1517480013726
Build timestamp as int: 1517480013726

CUDA/cuDNN version & GPU model and memory

I am not using CUDA / GPU

Exact command to reproduce

Configure TF with mkl support &

bazel build --config=opt //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package

CUDA/cuDNN version & GPU model and memory

Exact command to reproduce
------------------------------

Configure TF with mkl support & 

bazel build --config=opt //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package
